S:log-item.D:comment:
Derby-127: Handle the case of select statements that use a correlation names in the select list, a group by clause, and an order by clause that refers to a column by its database name instead of its correlation name. (Eg: select c1 as x from t where ... group by x order by c1) Derby currently throws an exception with SQLState 42x04.
Submitted by Jack Klebanoff (klebanoff-derby@sbcglobal.net)
